text: Methods : We retrospectively analysed microbiological and cytological findings in a selected population of young wheezers with symptoms unresponsive to inhaled corticosteroid ( ICS ) therapy , who underwent flexible bronchoscopy with bronchoalveolar lavage ( BAL ) . Procedural measures were taken to limit contamination risk and quantitative bacterial culture of BAL fluid ( significance cut - off ≥ 10 4 colony - forming units / ml ) was used . Modern microbiological methods were used for detection of a wide panel of pathogens and for characterisation of the bacterial isolates .
